extension.description: Visually manage your files with large thumbnails. Move files easily between folders using a modern grid view.
command.current.title: View Current Folder
command.open.title: Open Folder View...
command.split.title: Split File Directory
config.customFolderIcons.description: Map specific folder names to Material Design icons (e.g., "my-api": "folder-api").
config.customFileIcons.description: Map specific full filenames to icons (e.g., "webpack.config.js": "webpack").
